title: Opened gaming YouTube channel for my brother who paid me, is that money halal for me assim al hakeem
transcript: foreign for my brother where he used to make gaming videos I received 270 taka in exchange for opening this channel he opened the channel just for fun and not for any money income later I make him understand and stop his channel now my money has has been halal the money you received was it in return for some ads no share it's it is for uh to make the channel from him from him yeah no problem inshallah as long as he did not earn anything Haram from it or do anything Haram in it there's no problem inshallah
